name: savemydreams
0:
”Alexa, open save my dreams”
”Alexa, start save my dreams”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: save my dreams
des:
This skill is an Infotainment by Vayu Vaidya, in this episode, Dr Bheemaiah, brings Wisdom capital to you, from the annuls of indigenous knowledge and the best of grannies cuddles. 
"The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment, or diagnosis. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number."
A story of Padu, a chef and his journey down recreational drugs, and maybe your prescribed one.
Understand the untold effects of the psychedelic, through an example of Wellbutin, the fragmentation, memory fades, distortion of dreams, sleep and reality, the thin line of sanity. The net end result of an open subject to much abuse, an abuse of stolen identities, mixed realities and a misfortune of crevice, deeper than Mariana Trench.
The story has a happy ending with an indigenous twist, as Padu finds his indigenous self, much like "Jake" of Avatar, He heals. Rock to Linken Park, with this healing journey and heal your wounds and find yourself again.
This skill also contains soon to be added premium content on detoxing and alternative therapies, the spiritual parasail.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
